name: Daydream Mosaics 4: Shades of Blue
description:
This chapter of the Twin World saga takes you on a trip to visit the mesmerising underwater kingdom of the Azure world.
Solve nonograms and restore the submerged sanctuaries. Meet new characters and discover a long lost link between the twin worlds. A realm of tranquility and breathtaking beauty awaits and challenges the curious traveller. Hidden object, spot the difference and jigsaw minigames will provide more opportunities to explore the azure depths.

- 120 Mosaic (nonogram) boards
- Restore 3 ancient underwater sanctuaries
- 4 game modes.
- Spot the differences mini-game scenes
- Hidden Object mini-game scenes
- Jigsaw puzzles to complete

- Unlock beautiful wallpapers.
